item.title: Kafka topic creation with Scala and Gradle
item.description: If you develop a piece of software dealing with data systems, you are probably facing a few prerequisites. For example, you may need a file system to be mounted or a database table to be created. The same applies to event stream applications using Apache Kafka® as an event log. They need topics, schemas and ACLs to be created first, in order to run correctly.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Hello, again… I’ve decided to relaunch this site. People always insist on the importance of having a kind of portfolio, blog or website. It is true, especially for developers. So here is mine! It’s not totally new. I’ve revamped my previous attempt to create a personal page by migrating to Hugo.
